title: Private bank CEOs get a small raise
description: Private sector bank chiefs saw modest salary hikes in FY24, reflecting the RBI's strict oversight on CEO pay. HDFC Bank’s Sashidhar Jagdishan topped the list with ₹10.77 crore, followed by ICICI’s Sandeep Bakhshi at ₹9.96 crore, and Axis Bank’s Amitabh Chaudhry at ₹9.64 crore.
